src:
Nebo je granica: Kokeza dobio funkciju u UEFA
01 Nov 2019, 14:37 by Zile
Predsednik Fudbalskog saveza Srbije, Slaviša Kokeza, napravio je veliki iskorak u karijeri fudbalskog radnika.
Kokeza je izabran na mesto potpredsednika Komisije nacionalnih saveza UEFA.
Ova komisija ima 28 članova, a bavi se projektima i raspodelom sredstava po celom svetu.
Predsednik je Turčin Servet Jardimči, a funkciju potpredsednika pored Kokeze obavljaju Portugalac Fernando Gomeš i Rus Aleksandar Djukov.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The sky is the limit: Kokeza got a position at UEFA
01 Nov 2019, 14:37 by Zile
The president of the Football Association of Serbia, Slavisa Kokez, has made a major step forward in the career of a football worker.
Kokeza was elected Vice-President of the UEFA Commission.
This committee has 28 members, dealing with projects and the distribution of resources around the world.
The president is Turk Servet Jardimci, and the role of vice-president in addition to Kokeza is performed by Portuguese Fernando Gomes and Russian Alexander Djukov.
